title: Perler Bead Pen
description: This cool Bead Pen from Perler lets you place your beads on the pegboard quickly, and it's fun to use! The ergonomic design makes it easy to handle, and you can use it for all classic beads and pegboards (not intended for Biggie Beads). Perfect for ages 6 and up. To use, follow these simple steps: 1. Twist open the green cap to scoop up the beads you want to use. Close the cap. 2. Shake to let the beads fall into the channel. 3. Hold the bead pen vertically over the pegboard and push the green button to release the beads one at a time. Ideal when filling a large area with a single color.

title: Tray 'n Cards Pattern Kit - Biggie Beads
description:
A fun afternoon, rainy day, play date, or anytime activity! The Perler Tray 'n Cards Pattern Kit for Biggie Beads holds a pattern card and the large clear square pegboard while you complete the project, then stores the pattern cards for later. For ages 4 and up. Beads sold separately. Perler's Tray 'n Cards Pattern Kit includes: 
32 full-size patterns
Tray
Biggie Beads square pegboard, 5.875" square
Reusable ironing paper
Easy instructions

title: Pegboard Value Pack - 8 Ct

For ages 6 and up. title: Biggie Beads Clear Pegboards - 2 Ct
description: Perfect for little hands, Perler Biggie Beads (larger than our classic-size beads) help young children develop color identification and fine motor skills. Simply place the clear board over the pattern and place the beads! Ages 4 and up. The Perler Biggie Beads clear pegboard set includes: 2 clear square pegboards designed for use with Biggie Beads only, 5.875" square, ironing paper, 2 patterns, and easy instructions. Watch our video for a quick guide on how to fuse Biggie Beads.

title: Perler Summer Fun Deluxe Box Kit
description: Create 18 different projects with the Summer Fun activity kit from Perler. Bright, cheerful shades of beads are used to make animals, rainbows, food, and more. Includes 4000 fuse beads, 3 pegboards, pattern sheet with instructions, and ironing paper.

description: Everything you need is included to create these colorful nature designs with solid-top fuse beads. A fun alternative to classic Perler beads, Perler caps create a unique finished look. title: Perler Tray of Beads with Idea Book
description: What a value! This convenient and stackable tray includes 4,000 Perler beads in 16 colors, plus an Idea Book with over 400 designs that can be made with Perler pegboards. title: Large Basic Shapes Pegboards - 5 Ct
description:
Our 5 Large Basic Shapes pegboards in assorted colors are designed for use with Perler Beads. For ages 6 and up. The Perler Large Basic Shapes Pegboard set includes: 
Large square pegboard, 5.7" square 
Large circle pegboard, 6.1" diameter
Large heart pegboard, 6.75" x 6.12"
Large hexagon pegboard, 6.25" x 5.5"
Large star pegboard, 5.25" x 6"
Ironing paper
Easy instructions

title: Perler Bead Pen
description: This cool Bead Pen from Perler lets you place your beads on the pegboard quickly, and it's fun to use! The ergonomic design makes it easy to handle, and you can use it for all classic beads and pegboards (not intended for Biggie Beads). Perfect for ages 6 and up. To use, follow these simple steps: 1. Twist open the green cap to scoop up the beads you want to use. Close the cap. 2. Shake to let the beads fall into the channel. 3. Hold the bead pen vertically over the pegboard and push the green button to release the beads one at a time. Ideal when filling a large area with a single color.

title: Perler Pattern Pad - Volume 2
description: Enjoy hours of fun with Perler Beads! Our Pattern Pad Volume 2 includes 110 full-sized patterns and 8 blank sheets to design your own. Design themes include circus, sports, animals, bugs, flowers and more. Use with Perler clear or colored pegboards and our dozens of bead colors (sold separately). 28 pages. Pad size: 7.25" x 9". Ages 6 and up.
